roleset.name: cause to be tame
roleset.note: TAME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tame' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from tame.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no instrument
example.text: Maybe [Mr. Z.]-1 was too busy *trace*-1 taming his set to work with his naturally ungainly Alfredo.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John tamed Mary with charm, patience, and a bottle of chloroform.
example.arg: with charm, patience, and a bottle of chloroform
